divs: sighting detailsmy daughter and myself decided to go camping at mt charleston, outside of las vegas, nv. we stayed at the hilltop campground, because it was higher up, and out of the way. after setting up our tent, (it was dark, around 8 pm by this time) a woman (the only other camper in the area due to the time of year) appologized for bothering us, but asked us to come toward there camp site so we could see something. we walked up away from our site, were we met her husband. they pointed toward a distand mountain. what me and my daughter saw was unexplainable. a very large "glow" was "floating" over a distant mountain, illuminating a large section of it. there were three or four of these objects, floating, illuminating, seeming to just float and move with no set pattern. they were orange\ yellow in color, and there size seemed very large, as the mountain in the distance was beign illuminated in sections. i could not make out there shape, because they just seemed to be large floating illuminations of bright light. after a few moments they just seemed to "turn of", and there was nothing. after watching for a few, they all vanished. after a few moments of talking with the couple, one came back, followed by the others. they just seemed to appear again. one seemed to be coming closer to the area where we were staying, and i admit, it was a very "uncomfortable" feeling. we continued to watch again, and the distant mountain was ulluminated by the objects that came back. we also watched one of the objects seem to get closer to where we were. it wasnt close enough that we could make out any definitive shape, yet it was closer, and seemed to move in our direction. the feeling of being uncomfortable was growing stronger. because we were both uncomfortable (it was not a feeling of fear, nor anything other then a strange feeling that i can only describe as uncomfortable, hairs on your neck rising, the same feeling you can get when you feel that someone is watching you yet you cant see them) to pack up. the objects were still there when we finished putting away the tent, and we watched some more. over head, not far off, i saw 4-5 fighter jets, flying overhead, and toward the direction of the objects. i assume these jets were from nellis afb, which is in las vegas. the jets flew quickly and in formation straight toward these objects. the objects did not go away when the jets arrived. deciding it was time to go, we got in our vehicle, and headed out of the camp ground. the couple who originally came to get us to see the onjects had went into there camper and were nowhere to be seen, so we headed out. once we were on outside of the camp ground, and on the road that travels around mt charlston, we saw many vehicles driving towards kyle canyon (it was approx 11 pm at night, so the vehicles where very out of place as the road only goes towards a closed down ski resort and in the direction of the objects). we never reported what we saw as we had no camera, and saw nothing in the news, nor did i ever see any report of the incident. we have talked about what we saw on numerous times the past couple of years, and i have still been searching for something similar to what we saw in reports, news programs etc.
